doc.title: Das rote Strumpfband
doc.plot: Is it a love story? A tale of passion and betrayal? A game of illicit desires and longings? Or is it a tingling drama of raw emotions? Or how about a thriller to test the boundaries of the genre? Maybe even an erotic thriller to challenge the codes of screen propriety? Let's just say that Markus Fischer's The Red Garter, based on a short story by Juan Marsé, is all of these. The setting of this Swiss Erotic Tale is a single's apartment. An attractive young woman is accosted in the corridor by a young man with something rather sinister on his mind. A contest of give-and-take follows - one good turn deserves another.
